edge: Kaban Bhai decides to eliminate ACP Karan instead.
Vijju tries to protect his son, ACP Karan from being eliminated by gangsters.
ACP Karan is trying to woo Tanya.
Amrita presumes that Vijju and her mother must've had an affair many years ago, due to her mother's overly friendly nature to Vijju.
ACP Karan finally succeeds in winning over Tanya and her conservative father.
Vijju meets his estranged wife, Sita, but fails to patch up the relationship.
Tedha attempts once again and is successful in pumping some bullets into ACP Karan, failing Vijju's attempts to stop him from going to the place of the shootout.
Admitted by Vijju due to injury during shootout
Visits Kabir's den after admitting Karan to hospital
Accused by Vijju of being an undercover officer during shootout at den
Mentioned as alive by Vijju after shootout at den
Decides to go back to Paris, telling his wife Sita to bring Karan along when she is ready to do so
Son of Vijju, failed Vijju's attempts to stop him from going to the place of shootout
Finally reconciles with his wife during hospital scene
Bring Karan along when she is ready to do so, according to Vijju's decision in the hospital scene
Finally acknowledges that he is ageing during hospital scene
Both roped in by Vijju to the underworld don, but only Mac was spared by Vijju during shootout at den
Place of the shootout where Karan was present and Vijju attempted to stop him from going
